Operation 'SaveReview' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, not_actionable, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary 'Create a review' is too generic and doesn't indicate what type of review or what information is required. Description is incomplete - it lacks details about what inputs are expected (product ID, rating, content), what the response contains, and the business context (reviews are for products and displayed in store). Added specificity about authentication method, expected request fields, response structure, and the operational context that reviews are associated with users and displayed on product pages. This helps AI agents understand when to use this operation and what data to provide.

data.current_description:
Creates a single review. 
## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3). 
 For authentication, you must generate and use only your `VtexidClientAutCookie` to work with this endpoint. Refer to the [Generating user tokens](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/api-authentication-using-user-tokens#generating-a-user-token-with-the-vtex-io-cli) guide for more information.
data.summary_suggestion: Submit a product review with rating and content
data.description_suggestion: Creates a single product review with rating and optional content. This operation allows shoppers to submit reviews for products in your store. Requires user authentication via VtexIdClientAutCookie token. The request body should include the product ID, rating, review title, and review content. Returns the created review object with a unique review ID. The review will be associated with the authenticated user and stored in the Reviews and Ratings system for display on product pages.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Create a review' is too generic and doesn't indicate what type of review or what information is required. Description is incomplete - it lacks details about what inputs are expected (product ID, rating, content), what the response contains, and the business context (reviews are for products and displayed in store). Added specificity about authentication method, expected request fields, response structure, and the operational context that reviews are associated with users and displayed on product pages. This helps AI agents understand when to use this operation and what data to provide.

message: Operation 'GetProductRating' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. Original description is too minimal and doesn't explain what rating data is returned or how it's aggregated. Added context about return values (average rating, distribution), input requirements, and use case for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description:
Retrieves the rating of a product.
 ## Permissions

 This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the aggregated rating information for a product, including the average rating score and rating distribution. Requires the product ID as input. Returns rating statistics that can be used to display product ratings in the storefront. No special permissions required.
data.reasoning: Original description is too minimal and doesn't explain what rating data is returned or how it's aggregated. Added context about return values (average rating, distribution), input requirements, and use case for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'GetReviewbyReviewId' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description lacks specificity about what review data is returned and the operation's use cases. Enhanced to clarify return structure and typical use scenarios for AI agents.

data.current_summary: Get product review by review ID
data.current_description:
Retrieves information of a product review based on the review's ID.

 ## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed information for a specific product review using its review ID. Returns the complete review object including reviewer details, rating, title, body, and metadata. Useful for displaying individual review details or validating review existence before updates or deletions. No special permissions required.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description lacks specificity about what review data is returned and the operation's use cases. Enhanced to clarify return structure and typical use scenarios for AI agents.

message: Operation 'DeleteReview' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_side_effects. Original summary is too generic. Description lacks information about side effects (rating recalculation) and permanence of deletion. Enhanced to clarify the action's consequences and impact on product ratings for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description:
Deletes an existing review. 

 ## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Permanently deletes a product review by its review ID. This operation removes the review from the system and updates the product's aggregated rating accordingly. The deletion is irreversible. Returns a success confirmation. No special permissions required.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description lacks information about side effects (rating recalculation) and permanence of deletion. Enhanced to clarify the action's consequences and impact on product ratings for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'EditReview' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is generic. Description lacks critical details about what fields can be updated, partial update support, and side effects on aggregated ratings. Enhanced to clarify updateable fields, partial update capability, and rating recalculation impact.

data.current_description:
Updates the information of a review. 

## Permissions
 
This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Updates an existing product review's information including rating, title, and body text. Accepts partial updates - only provided fields will be modified. Requires the review ID and updated review data in the request body. Returns the updated review object. Changes to ratings will trigger recalculation of the product's aggregated rating. No special permissions required.
data.reasoning: Summary is generic. Description lacks critical details about what fields can be updated, partial update support, and side effects on aggregated ratings. Enhanced to clarify updateable fields, partial update capability, and rating recalculation impact.

message: Operation 'GetalistofReviews' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context. Summary is too generic. Description doesn't explain filtering/pagination capabilities despite 8 parameters being available. Enhanced to clarify filtering options, pagination support, and use cases for AI agents to understand when to use this operation.

data.current_description:
Retrieves a list of reviews related to a product.
## Permissions 

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of product reviews with support for filtering, sorting, and searching. Supports filtering by product ID, rating, status, and other criteria. Returns review objects with pagination metadata. Useful for displaying reviews in storefronts or managing review moderation. Supports 8 query parameters for advanced filtering and pagination control. No special permissions required.
data.reasoning: Summary is too generic. Description doesn't explain filtering/pagination capabilities despite 8 parameters being available. Enhanced to clarify filtering options, pagination support, and use cases for AI agents to understand when to use this operation.

message: Operation 'SaveMultipleReviews' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is generic. Description doesn't clarify batch structure, required fields, authentication requirements, or return values. Enhanced to explain batch input format, authentication method, return structure, and side effects on product ratings.

data.current_description:
Creates multiple reviews for more than one product in a single operation.
## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3). 
 For authentication, you must generate and use only the Application Key and the Application Token to work with this endpoint. Refer to the [API authentication using application keys](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/api-authentication-using-application-keys) and [Generating internal application keys](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/application-keys--2iffYzlvvz4BDMr6WGUtet#generating-internal-application-keys) guide for more information.
data.summary_suggestion: Batch create reviews for multiple products
data.description_suggestion: Creates multiple product reviews in a single batch operation, supporting reviews for different products. Accepts an array of review objects in the request body, each containing product ID, rating, title, and body. Requires Application Key and Application Token authentication. Returns confirmation of created reviews with their assigned review IDs. Useful for bulk importing reviews or programmatic review creation. Aggregated product ratings are updated for affected products.
data.reasoning: Summary is generic. Description doesn't clarify batch structure, required fields, authentication requirements, or return values. Enhanced to explain batch input format, authentication method, return structure, and side effects on product ratings.

message: Operation 'DeleteMultipleReviews' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is generic. Description lacks information about batch input format, permanence, and side effects on product ratings. Enhanced to clarify batch input structure, irreversibility, rating recalculation impact, and typical use cases.

data.current_description:
Deletes multiple reviews at once. 

 ## Permissions
 
This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Permanently deletes multiple product reviews in a single batch operation. Accepts an array of review IDs in the request body. Deletions are irreversible and will trigger recalculation of aggregated ratings for affected products. Returns confirmation of deleted review IDs. Useful for bulk moderation or cleanup operations. No special permissions required.
data.reasoning: Summary is generic. Description lacks information about batch input format, permanence, and side effects on product ratings. Enhanced to clarify batch input structure, irreversibility, rating recalculation impact, and typical use cases.

Operation 'SaveReview' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, not_actionable, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary 'Create a review' is too generic and doesn't indicate what type of review or what information is required. Description is incomplete - it lacks details about what inputs are expected (product ID, rating, content), what the response contains, and the business context (reviews are for products and displayed in store). Added specificity about authentication method, expected request fields, response structure, and the operational context that reviews are associated with users and displayed on product pages. This helps AI agents understand when to use this operation and what data to provide.

data.current_description:
Creates a single review. 
## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3). 
 For authentication, you must generate and use only your `VtexidClientAutCookie` to work with this endpoint. Refer to the [Generating user tokens](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/api-authentication-using-user-tokens#generating-a-user-token-with-the-vtex-io-cli) guide for more information.
data.summary_suggestion: Submit a product review with rating and content
data.description_suggestion: Creates a single product review with rating and optional content. This operation allows shoppers to submit reviews for products in your store. Requires user authentication via VtexIdClientAutCookie token. The request body should include the product ID, rating, review title, and review content. Returns the created review object with a unique review ID. The review will be associated with the authenticated user and stored in the Reviews and Ratings system for display on product pages.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Create a review' is too generic and doesn't indicate what type of review or what information is required. Description is incomplete - it lacks details about what inputs are expected (product ID, rating, content), what the response contains, and the business context (reviews are for products and displayed in store). Added specificity about authentication method, expected request fields, response structure, and the operational context that reviews are associated with users and displayed on product pages. This helps AI agents understand when to use this operation and what data to provide.

message: Operation 'GetProductRating' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. Original description is too minimal and doesn't explain what rating data is returned or how it's aggregated. Added context about return values (average rating, distribution), input requirements, and use case for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description:
Retrieves the rating of a product.
 ## Permissions

 This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the aggregated rating information for a product, including the average rating score and rating distribution. Requires the product ID as input. Returns rating statistics that can be used to display product ratings in the storefront. No special permissions required.
data.reasoning: Original description is too minimal and doesn't explain what rating data is returned or how it's aggregated. Added context about return values (average rating, distribution), input requirements, and use case for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'GetReviewbyReviewId' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description lacks specificity about what review data is returned and the operation's use cases. Enhanced to clarify return structure and typical use scenarios for AI agents.

data.current_summary: Get product review by review ID
data.current_description:
Retrieves information of a product review based on the review's ID.

 ## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed information for a specific product review using its review ID. Returns the complete review object including reviewer details, rating, title, body, and metadata. Useful for displaying individual review details or validating review existence before updates or deletions. No special permissions required.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description lacks specificity about what review data is returned and the operation's use cases. Enhanced to clarify return structure and typical use scenarios for AI agents.

message: Operation 'DeleteReview' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_side_effects. Original summary is too generic. Description lacks information about side effects (rating recalculation) and permanence of deletion. Enhanced to clarify the action's consequences and impact on product ratings for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description:
Deletes an existing review. 

 ## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Permanently deletes a product review by its review ID. This operation removes the review from the system and updates the product's aggregated rating accordingly. The deletion is irreversible. Returns a success confirmation. No special permissions required.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description lacks information about side effects (rating recalculation) and permanence of deletion. Enhanced to clarify the action's consequences and impact on product ratings for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'EditReview' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is generic. Description lacks critical details about what fields can be updated, partial update support, and side effects on product ratings. Enhanced to clarify updateable fields, request structure, and rating recalculation impact.

data.current_description:
Updates the information of a review. 

## Permissions
 
This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Updates an existing product review's information including rating, title, and body text. Accepts partial updates - only provided fields will be modified. Requires the review ID and updated review data in the request body. Returns the updated review object. Changes to the rating will trigger recalculation of the product's aggregated rating. No special permissions required.
data.reasoning: Summary is generic. Description lacks critical details about what fields can be updated, partial update support, and side effects on product ratings. Enhanced to clarify updateable fields, request structure, and rating recalculation impact.

message: Operation 'GetalistofReviews' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is too generic. Description doesn't explain the 8 parameters available for filtering/sorting or pagination support. Enhanced to clarify filtering capabilities, pagination, and typical use cases for AI agents to understand when to use this operation.

data.current_description:
Retrieves a list of reviews related to a product.
## Permissions 

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of product reviews with support for filtering, sorting, and searching. Supports filtering by product ID, rating, status, and other criteria through query parameters. Returns an array of review objects with pagination metadata. Useful for displaying reviews in storefronts or managing review moderation. No special permissions required.
data.reasoning: Summary is too generic. Description doesn't explain the 8 parameters available for filtering/sorting or pagination support. Enhanced to clarify filtering capabilities, pagination, and typical use cases for AI agents to understand when to use this operation.

message: Operation 'SaveMultipleReviews' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is generic. Description buries authentication requirements and doesn't clarify batch structure, return values, or side effects on product ratings. Enhanced to highlight batch efficiency, authentication specifics, return structure, and rating updates.

data.current_description:
Creates multiple reviews for more than one product in a single operation.
## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3). 
 For authentication, you must generate and use only the Application Key and the Application Token to work with this endpoint. Refer to the [API authentication using application keys](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/api-authentication-using-application-keys) and [Generating internal application keys](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/application-keys--2iffYzlvvz4BDMr6WGUtet#generating-internal-application-keys) guide for more information.
data.summary_suggestion: Batch create reviews for multiple products
data.description_suggestion: Creates multiple product reviews in a single batch operation, supporting reviews for different products. Requires Application Key and Application Token authentication. Accepts an array of review objects in the request body. Returns confirmation of created reviews with their assigned review IDs. Batch processing improves efficiency for bulk review imports. Updates product ratings for affected products.
data.reasoning: Summary is generic. Description buries authentication requirements and doesn't clarify batch structure, return values, or side effects on product ratings. Enhanced to highlight batch efficiency, authentication specifics, return structure, and rating updates.

message: Operation 'DeleteMultipleReviews' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is generic. Description lacks information about request structure (array of IDs), side effects (rating recalculation), permanence, and use cases. Enhanced to clarify batch input format, cascading effects on product ratings, and typical scenarios for AI agents.

data.current_description:
Deletes multiple reviews at once. 

 ## Permissions
 
This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Permanently deletes multiple product reviews in a single batch operation. Requires an array of review IDs in the request body. This operation removes all specified reviews from the system and recalculates aggregated ratings for affected products. Deletions are irreversible. Returns confirmation of deleted review IDs. Useful for bulk moderation or cleanup operations. No special permissions required.
data.reasoning: Summary is generic. Description lacks information about request structure (array of IDs), side effects (rating recalculation), permanence, and use cases. Enhanced to clarify batch input format, cascading effects on product ratings, and typical scenarios for AI agents.

data.current_description:
Creates multiple reviews for more than one product in a single operation.
## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3). 
 For authentication, you must generate and use only the Application Key and the Application Token to work with this endpoint. Refer to the [API authentication using application keys](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/api-authentication-using-application-keys) and [Generating internal application keys](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/application-keys--2iffYzlvvz4BDMr6WGUtet#generating-internal-application-keys) guide for more information.
data.summary_suggestion: Batch create reviews for multiple products
data.description_suggestion: Creates multiple product reviews in a single batch operation, supporting reviews for different products. Accepts an array of review objects in the request body, each containing product ID, rating, title, and body. Requires Application Key and Application Token authentication. Returns confirmation with created review IDs and any validation errors. Useful for bulk review imports or programmatic review submission.
data.reasoning: Summary doesn't emphasize batch/bulk capability. Description lacks details about request structure (array of reviews), required fields per review, and response format. Enhanced to clarify batch processing, authentication requirements, input structure, and return values for AI agent clarity.

data.current_description:
Deletes multiple reviews at once. 

 ## Permissions
 
This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Permanently deletes multiple product reviews in a single batch operation. Accepts an array of review IDs in the request body. This operation removes all specified reviews from the system and updates aggregated ratings for affected products accordingly. Returns confirmation of deleted review IDs and any processing errors. Deletions are irreversible. No special permissions required.
data.reasoning: Summary doesn't emphasize batch capability. Description lacks information about input format (array of IDs), side effects on product ratings, and irreversibility. Enhanced to clarify batch processing, input structure, rating recalculation impact, and permanence of deletion.
